column2: an A.M. Eatery////I went on a weekday and we got seated immediately. I ordered the Snooze Classic breakfast vegan-ized. Sub tofu scramble for egg
column3: choose soyrizo and ask to omit butter. Make sure to mention you want to vegan-ize
column4: the waitstaff are knowledgable and will make sure it's right! This breakfast was awesome
column5: and deliciously rich...a little on the oily side
column6: but 10/10 would get again. Great condiment selection
column7: including Yellowbird hot sauce and Sir Kensington ketchup.
